intent_atoms.description: Provide a CLI schema banner that displays VR-006 research log fields for both CLI and UI consumers
Enable programmatic audit of stored research log files to verify conformance to the supported schema via ResearchLogMonitor.audit(logURL:)

functional_units.name: CLI Schema Banner
functional_units.description: Displays a banner in the CLI that shows the VR-006 research log schema fields sourced from ResearchLogSchema

functional_units.name: ResearchLogMonitor.audit(logURL:)
functional_units.description: Programmatic checkpoint that verifies stored research log files conform to the supported VR-006 schema

functional_units.name: UI Integration of Audit Helper via ResearchLogPreviewProvider
functional_units.description: Integrates the audit helper into SwiftUI previews for visual inspection

functional_units.name: UI Smoke Telemetry Test (ResearchLogTelemetrySmokeTests)
functional_units.description: Watches UI for missing VR-006 entries during smoke testing
